dict.string: if test \! -e "$TM_NEW_FILE"; then echo '<?xml version="1.0"?> <!DOCTYPE cross-domain-policy SYSTEM "http://www.macromedia.com/xml/dtds/cross-domain-policy.dtd"> <cross-domain-policy> <allow-access-from domain="*" /> <allow-access-from domain="*.domain.com" /> </cross-domain-policy>' > "$TM_NEW_FILE"; fi
